edge_1: Little hides from bullies at a crackhouse and spends the night with Juan and his girlfriend Teresa. Juan teaches Little the basics of life and helps him cope with being tormented by peers. Juan berates Little's mother Paula for neglecting him due to her addiction and argues with her about Chiron's upbringing.
edge_2: Juan lets Little spend the night with him and his girlfriend Teresa.

edge_1: Little's mother Paula is addicted to crack and neglects him. She implies that Little gets tormented by his peers because of 'the way he walks.'
edge_2: Paula asks Chiron to visit her at the drug treatment center where she is living.

edge_1: Little goes by the nickname Chiron.
edge_2: Chiron spends time with Teresa, who has lived alone since Juan's death.

edge_1: Little goes by the nickname Chiron.
edge_2: Paula forces Chiron to give her the money he receives from Teresa because she has turned to prostitution due to her worsening addiction.
